attributes.action: have an Englishman on the back of a £20 note rather than a Scottish economist
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: there are so many great englishmen in our history that i don't understand why we have to endure a picture of a scottish economist on the back of a £20 note,it seems to me that the english are being undermined yet again.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Bank of England.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
